title: Why do two thin blankets give more heat in the comparison of a thick blanket? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is way outside of my area of expertise but my understanding is because as your body heat seeps through one layer, some of it gets trapped between the two layers and held in. That is the reason people in cold places layer— not only can layers be removed as it warms, but heat is trapped between layers, keeping you warmer.
